issue.message: Lint found one or more custom checks using its older Java API; these checks are still run in compatibility mode, but this causes duplicated parsing, and in the next version lint will no longer include this legacy mode. Make sure the following lint detectors are upgraded to the new API: butterknife.lint.InvalidR2UsageDetector, timber.lint.WrongTimberUsageDetector
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
A newer version of com.jakewharton.timber:timber than 4.1.0 is available: 4.5.1
